message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $160 for it.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $100 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $140. This product is truly top-quality and a steal at this price.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $120?
